title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 79.13 - Compliance with official orders, signals or directions is required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 79.13 - Compliance with official orders, signals or directions is required

State Regulations

The aircraft operator shall comply with any order, signal
or direction of any representative of the airport operator. When the operation
of the aircraft is controlled by lights, signs, mechanical or electrical
signals, or pavement markings, such lights, signs, signals and markings shall
be obeyed unless the airport operator directs otherwise. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
79.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
